summary: The module contains unit tests that verify the functionality of the pass‑through streaming handler used in the Litellm proxy. It checks that raw byte chunks from an async iterator are correctly processed into string lines and that the streaming generator yields the expected data under various mocked conditions.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correct operation of the streaming endpoint in the Litellm proxy, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable conversion of streamed byte data for downstream API consumption.
